Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3759476,"totalDownVotes":309722,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":61240,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¬°Hola! ¬°Actualmente estamos trabajando para mejorar nuestras traducciones al espa√±ol!

The game contains flashy lights and imagery that may cause discomfort or seizures to those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. In VIP servers, Item spawning is x1.3 more rare and long. You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. - First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":267028,"totalDownVotes":140990,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":22206,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1415010,"totalDownVotes":118737,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":24927,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

üéµ M√∫sica por: https://twitter.com/LawnReality"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1186550,"totalDownVotes":67752,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":14273,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":185757,"totalDownVotes":30508,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ GOJO & HIEI ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":6749,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Check the second page of the roster to see JoJo characters.
 
Controls:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Block
Basic Attack: Mouse1
Space+Mouse1: Aerial Attack
Combine Basic Attacks and Aerial Attacks to discover new combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 for your character special moves.
Transformation: G

Developers:  Melon_Sensei, Chicken_Man, Snakeworl
Contributors: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA, Nilvaat, jjjakey, Kogrin, rikaid, Estheking"},{"creatorId":9277770,"creatorName":"Anime Legend Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":96277,"totalDownVotes":7792,"universeId":2317140681,"name":"[JOJO UPDATE] Anime Mania","placeId":6284881984,"playerCount":8068,"imageToken":"T_6284881984_34ef","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"This is Anime Mania. Upon joining the game, it is suggested that you spend some of the gems that you have rolling on a few characters. Then you should equip 3 of these characters in order to make your team. After making your team, you can play the game by starting a room and you can either invite your friends or play alone. Obtain more characters, win the arenas, and upgrade your characters! 

PC Controls:
Left Click: Basic Attack
Right Click: Heavy Attack
1,2,3,4- Character Skills
Jump + Left Click: Up Combo
Left Click In air: Air finish or simply use a move.

Inspired by Ani-Blox Legends, and All Star Tower Defense.

Owners: 123imnotm0mo and Yakrus
Developers: jacobman737, Lazarovip2,F33NY
Contributors: Swingset68, Arricku,Elikage,LightTheProtagonist, Rinanori"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":659928,"totalDownVotes":128025,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":4748,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Take part in a 5v5 team based fire fight across a variety of maps spanning across the globe.

Earn in-match money by eliminating enemies and playing objectives, which you can use to buy new weapons, gear and grenades at the start of each round.

Press B to open buy menu at spawn, press N to open menu.

Enjoy FPS games? We've made four other FPS games you can play!
Check them out: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2613928




"},{"creatorId":6465898,"creatorName":"Last EXE","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":8514,"totalDownVotes":1881,"universeId":2340432463,"name":"[New Event!!] Last Pirates","placeId":6329844902,"playerCount":8111,"imageToken":"T_6329844902_7145","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Current Level cap : 600
Current Fruit : Tori,Yami,Pika,Mera,Moku,Suna,Suke,Guru,Yomi,Bomu,Hie,Magu,Zushi,Gura,Soru,Bisu,Bari

Devil fruit spawn every 30 mins and respawn every 10 mins

Control
Q - Dash
Ctrl - Sprint/Run
